answerText: ophiolites[10] Magnetic stripes in ophiolite complexes are evidence of this process, which is the mechanism by which continental drift occurs. In this process, new crust is created at mid-ocean ridges and pushes the plates away.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Penn and Wake Forest | 16 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: They are named for the fact that they often contain green rocks like serpentine, and they often contain sheeted dyke complexes. For 10 points each: [10] Name these structures which are pieces of oceanic crust that have been deposited onto continental plates via subduction.
